#### 環境設定

以下為老師執行時一定會存在的環境設定
```{r basic setup, message=FALSE, echo=TRUE, eval=T}
rm(list=ls())
library(dplyr); library(stringr); library(ggplot2); library(plotly); library(lubridate); library(readr); library(colorspace); library(grDevices); library(shiny); library(shinyjs); library(scales)
library(tidyr); library(showtext); library(tidyverse); library(colorspace); library(ggpubr); library(magick);
library(sf); library(rmapshaper);library(magrittr)

#font_add("QYuan","cwTeXQYuan-Medium.ttf") # 新增字體
showtext_auto(enable=TRUE) #啟用字體
theme_set(theme_classic())
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.align='center', fig.showtext=T)
```


#### 繪圖程式

```{r graph, echo=T, eval=T}
load("df_politics_news.rda")

list() -> map

data(world,package = "spData")

world[1,] 

world %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = df_politics_news, fill = "red",
          alpha = 0.5, size = 1) +
  theme_void()-> map$all


world %>%
  filter(
    continent == "Africa"
  ) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = (df_politics_news %>%
                    filter(region_un == "Africa")),
          fill = "red",
          alpha = 0.5, size =1) +
  theme_void() -> map$Africa

world %>%
  filter(
    region_un == "Americas"
  ) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = (df_politics_news %>%
                    filter(region_un == "Americas")),
          fill = "red",
          alpha = 0.5, size = 1) +
  theme_void() -> map$Americas

world %>%
  .[-which(world$iso_a2 == "RU"),] %>%
  filter(
    region_un == "Europe"
  ) %>%
  st_crop(
    xmin = -30, xmax = 80,
    ymin = 0, ymax = 75
  ) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = (df_politics_news %>%
                    filter(region_un == "Europe")),
          fill = "red",
          alpha = 0.5, size = 1) +
  theme_void() -> map$Europe
  


world %>%
  filter(
    region_un == "Asia"
  )%>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = (df_politics_news %>%
                    filter(region_un == "Asia")),
          fill = "red",
          alpha = 0.5, size = 1) +
  theme_void()-> map$Asia

class(map$Asia)


save(map,file = "map.rda")
```
